title: Kazgarâ€™s Revenge v1.0.0.39
description: is a cel-shaded hack and slash (with local multiplayer), in which you play as a villain having a mid-life crisis who gets kicked out of his tower, and now must wade through masses of rebelling minions to reclaim it. This game has a unique co-op system. One main player controls Kazgar, creates a custom talent tree, and gathers equipment. You can also have up to 4 secondary players using gamepads that play as Kazgar's minions (by supporting Kazgar in battles and leveling up). The gameplay focuses on using your abilities to beat down enemies, finding a key to unlock the boss's chamber for each floor, and defeating the boss
